articles.title: Haliburton, Pacers stun Bucks in OT to advance - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana star Tyrese Haliburton blew past Giannis Antetokounmpo for the go-ahead layup with 1.3 seconds left to give the Pacers a 119-118 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks and a 4-1 series win in the Eastern Conference first round on Tuesday night.
articles.content:
Apr 29, 2025, 09:31 PM ET
INDIANAPOLIS -- Tyrese Haliburton and the Indiana Pacers stole one from the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday night.
Indiana forced two turnovers in the final 17 seconds of overt… [+1116 chars]
